snippet: Detroit Red Wings captain Henrik Zetterberg, who last week was ruled out of Sweden's bid for ice hockey glory at the Sochi Olympics with a herniated disc, had back surgery on Friday, the National Hockey League team said....

headline.print_headline: Red Wings' Zetterberg Has Back Surgery, Out for Eight Weeks
headline.main: Red Wings' Zetterberg Has Back Surgery, Out for Eight Weeks

lead_paragraph: Detroit Red Wings captain Henrik Zetterberg, who last week was ruled out of Sweden's bid for ice hockey glory at the Sochi Olympics with a herniated disc, had back surgery on Friday, the National Hockey League team said.
